EmailTemplate.name: RE: Consulting Agreement - Danielle Poux (1352505323.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Consulting Agreement - Danielle Poux (1352505323.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Heidi, Probably the best way to handle is to edit our our standard agreement <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf> and statement of work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> and send that over. I just cant send something on behalf of MBO Partners that hasnt been approved by legal if that makes sense. That being said, we can be flexable and incorporate things from your statement of work (see attached and let me know what you think.) Also, MBO is not able to bill for late fees. We can go over all of this on Monday but I wanted to give you the weekend to review this. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Heidi Everett [mailto:heidijeverett@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, November 09, 2012 6:26 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Consulting Agreement - Danielle Poux Something I created and want to send to Danielle. Should I handle this differently?
On Nov 9, 2012, at 6:24 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Heidi, I am a little confused, is this something you created and are sending to Danielle or is this something she provided to you? Just want to make sure I understand that so I can make edits/adjustments accordingly. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1RQsU587uqcMKz5ixXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1RQsU587uqcMKz5ixXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1RQsU587uqcMKz5ixXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Heidi Everett [mailto:heidijeverett@gmail.com <mailto:heidijeverett@gmail.com>] Sent: Friday, November 09, 2012 3:19 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Consulting Agreement - Danielle Poux Sara: Do you mind reviewing and forwarding the attached contract to Danielle Poux (danielle@daniellesdesserts.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:danielle@daniellesdesserts.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCc1RQsU587uqcMKz5ixXHd5mht%2FJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>)?
